skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy with 2 random allies.

Damage inflicted by this Champion and any allies joining this attack will be increased by 20% if the target is under a [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], or [Petrification] debuff. Allies joining the attack use their default skills.
skills.name: Fiend Purge
